Vajira Lasantha Thambawita (PhD)

About Me

Vajira is a resech scientist at SimulaMet, Norway. He is from the computer engineering background. A thesis with the title "Cache Optimization techniques of GPGPUs" was completed for his master degree. He is currently working on a research project called Generative Adversarial Network in Medicine, which is targeting better cross-domain feature transfer mechanisms.  In addition to his main research project, he has completed severla dataset papers and deep learning method papers in the domain of medicine.

To get more informatin about me.
